headline: How Recent Developments Are Shaping the Investment Story for Baker Hughes
summary: Baker Hughes stock has recently seen its consensus analyst price target rise slightly, from $51.43 to $51.75 per share. This revision reflects an evolving debate among Wall Street analysts. Some have bullish perspectives, highlighting the company’s momentum in industrial technologies and strategic diversification, while others urge caution given sector volatility. Stay tuned to see how you can stay informed as new developments continue to shape the outlook for Baker Hughes. What Wall Street...

headline: Basin rig count up one as prices drop
summary: The rig count in the Permian Basin was up one this week, the latest count Friday by Baker Hughes shows, with 251 rigs active in the region. A year ago, 304 rigs were active in the region. Nationally, the oil and gas rig count is up one from last week at 548 rigs. A year ago, 585 rigs were active. The count shows that 418 rigs sought oil, unchanged from the previous week, and 121 explored for ...
